nodes.text: A wrist mount was a weapon attachment that allowed a user to mount their weapon to their wrist, leaving their hands free and preventing the wielder from dropping it. Wrist mounts could be activated with various methods, such as a programmed wrist gesture, vocal trigger, or a direct neural link. Models of wrist mount included the Corellian Arms Model 2 Wrist Mount and the BlasTech Industries WM-Alpha Pistol Brace.
